Room.Name: Orange Jacinith Hall
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a magnificant orange hallway composed completely of orange jacinith gemstones. The passage continues to the east and west.
Room.LongDescription: Upon careful examination of the corridor, you notice that you cannot in fact go east without breaking your neck. As you walk east, you bump into a large crystal object that acts like a giant mirror. The mirror is so proportioned that the corridor at which you are looking appears to go straight through to the iron gate.
